Detailed Description

template<typename Array, class Orientation = cusp::row_major>
class cusp::array2d_view< Array, Orientation >

array2d_view : One-dimensional array view

Template Parameters:
Array Underlying one-dimensional array view
Orientation orientation of the array (cusp::row_major or cusp::column_major)

example
